catalogue_description: Fihrist: Union Catalogue of Manuscripts from the Islamicate World
title: Kitāb Mabāhij al-fikar wa-manāhij al-ʻibar
author: Waṭwāṭ, Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Yaḥyá, 1235-1318
description: 1 copy of Kitāb Mabāhij al-fikar wa-manāhij al-ʻibar by Waṭwāṭ, Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Yaḥyá, 1235-1318.
hand: Manuscript description based on the Bodleian Library's public card index of Arabic manuscripts with additional enhancements by the OCIMCO project team.
